name: The Chattering
description:
MATURE CONTENT 

The monster can distort time itself can you find all the notes and uncover the story or will you be left to become part of it's collection.

(You have to be caught by the monster to progress there are 4 levels each time you "die" you go up a level make sure to find the notes before getting caught. One of the levels have two notes so be on the lookout)

Controls are WASD to move and P to pause the game :)

Can you find the [Redacted] ending
